Articles.Content: I see, thank you
Looks like the .23 update has put a nail in the coffin for the DEMV's cant get them to drive now

Looks like the .23 update has put a nail in the coffin for the DEMV's cant get them to drive now

that's too bad.

How does one go about downloading the DEMV's? The links are still to Kerbal.netÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Ã¢â‚¬Â¦.

I do see the other post's, but only the MK3's are in the spaceport.
So the mod doesn't work anymore ? Can someone make it work.

Give Bobcat some time people the update was just released yesterday as I have seen many times before (as I have played since 0.15) he can do amazing things just give him time as he can do anything whenever he gets the time. 0.23 might not have put the nail in the coffin for the DEMV's they just need a little love and attention from Bobcat or someone with his Russian ingenuity.
Give me time
And just when this thread is about to go all mad, Bobcat comes in and saves the day. That looks beautiful, Bobcat. We'll be patient for you
The new HOME will really blow the old pack out of water, that's for sure. Can't wait for that new pod.

Give me time

I can't! It's not mine to give

Give Bobcat some time people the update was just released yesterday as I have seen many times before (as I have played since 0.15) he can do amazing things just give him time as he can do anything whenever he gets the time. 0.23 might not have put the nail in the coffin for the DEMV's they just need a little love and attention from Bobcat or someone with his Russian ingenuity.

Didnt Bobcat said that he doesnt care about these old DEMV rovers anymore? Someone said it somewhere. I woudl like to know if i can even except them back in game.

Also - this HUD navball looks awesome... it is rasta proper mmonitor work or you Bobcat created it yourself?

It's RasterProp. And no, you won't ever see the old DEMV rovers updated. Just get over it and let them go, BobCat is making awesome new HOME system, which will probably have a better rover family anyway.

Yes it is RasterPropMonitor but Bobcat modified it for his purposes so there is also some work of himself in there too . At least he modified it for his historical pack, I guess that is what he has done here too.
Bobcat has stated he is not going to work on the older stuff and refused to give the older stuff to someone else to update. He has valid reasons for his decision so let them die quietly.

Well, i hope other modders will be able to use this navball HUD, because its simply awesome... Glass cockpits from RasterProp (rasta proper lol) taken to new level.

Edited December 18, 2013 by kiwiak
Ohh Hope it gets an update. The DEMV Mk 2 Living pod just BEGS to be turned into a mobile science lab.

I think all that needs doing to get functionality back is a new recompiled DLL I know cleverwalrus did the last one in May so perhaps if we asked her nicely she might recompile it to work with .23 does anyone know her I sent a PM but she hasnt been on in a while. It also drives this mod http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/cleverbobcat-0-18/ which is also very popular

Edited December 20, 2013 by Virtualgenius
Hey there's a new cleverbobcat version for 0.23

The Bobcat ROVERS are ALIVE with a BIG thanks to cleverwalrus so we can still use them till the next generation comes along and then they can fade away quietly

Get the updated plugin from here http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/cleverbobcat-0-18/

The Bobcat ROVERS are ALIVE with a BIG thanks to cleverwalrus so we can still use them till the next generation comes along and then they can fade away quietly

Get the updated plugin from here http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/cleverbobcat-0-18/

That's great. I want to be able to use DEMV-5 "Ant" Rovers again. I installed the above, and it works. I then added the DEMV-5 "part" into the same parts folder as inside the Cleverwalrus folder, but the game stops loading. Any ideas?

- GeorgeG
the legs on HOME 2 wont deploy for me in 0.23 anyone else having this problem??

the legs on HOME 2 wont deploy for me in 0.23 anyone else having this problem??

Where did you get HOME 2??

Where did you get HOME 2??

Generally speaking the best way to get Bobcat's work is to go the spaceport and search for "bobcat". That said, I'm pretty sure he's taken down the HOME 2 files, because he's working on a rebooted version to go with the new DEMVs - BurutalRIP must have had it saved from earlier. There's a thread in the development forum if you'd like to follow the latest on the HOME stuff.

Where did you get HOME 2??

Having the same problem ):

The HOME on the kerbal spaceport has the HOME 2 or whatever it's called. http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-h-o-m-e-start-kit/

Edited December 30, 2013 by DrBackjack

Generally speaking the best way to get Bobcat's work is to go the spaceport and search for "bobcat". yeah you are correct i had them saved from before and the legs are working but only with the "g" key
